attr.title: Circa Infinity
attr.desc: Circa Infinity is a brain-melting circular platformer by Kenny Sun, with a pulse-pounding soundtrack by Jack + Jim Fay.
attr.inst:
Purchase the game on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/390610/Circa_Infinity/ and place the CircaInfinity.exe into the gamedata folder.
It is also available on Itch.io https://kennysun.itch.io/circa-infinity and it comes with a Steam key.
You can also use the free demo, download it from  https://kennysun.itch.io/circa-infinity-demo and place the CircaInfinityDemo.exe into the gamedata folder.
